entry: Hey baby Nala,
I miss you immensely,
and as of today I'm going to do my best to write as often as possible to you
as life continues to move on and I continue to honor and celebrate the beautiful life you blessed me with.
I'm going to be that one guy...
at the dog park without a dog
I can vividly imagine you when I walk alone
your head turning back to look over your shoulder
time is once again my enemy
I miss everything about you
I think about Ammie asking me
when's the last time Nala did something really bad?
I still think to this minute
I honestly can't remember
Time is running,
thoughts are racing.
8 1/2 years is too short
but you lived them beautifully and taught me so much
and I'm forever blessed
bitchass cancer
'so we both died in our dreams?'
I wake up in the morning,
and go to bed
greeting you,
because I know you're there.
I love and miss you,
Nala.
I heard a rustle in the back of the car
and instantly thought it was you repositioning yourself to stay steady.
I loved the sound...
it was a sweet gentle, bitter sweet reminder
that you were gone...
a silent snap back to reality
turns out it was the umbrella
you were a fucking champion
